smart_contract_assurance.rationale: External audit on smart contracts; already embedded in origination but documented here for transparency

dscr_break_even.note: DSCR paths assumed invariant to rate shocks; rate scenarios only affect pricing.

platform.name: Centrifuge/Tinlake
platform.description: Decentralized RWA liquidity protocol for tokenized real-world assets

liquidity_sourcing.description: CFG token rewards attract external LPs, eliminating sponsor capital requirement
benefits: No sponsor capital locked as LP

platform_comparison.selection_rationale: Lowest fee (15 bps), CFG incentives, $1.45B TVL, purpose-built for RWA debt pools

notes.maple: Institutional focus, higher minimums, higher servicing/manager fees
notes.goldfinch: Higher spread to LPs, concentrated credit risk to single manager
notes.traditional_spv: 50-100 bps servicing/admin fees, no protocol incentives

cost_summary.rationale: Using Centrifuge avoids locking sponsor capital as LP while only paying 15bps protocol fee

recommendation.rationale: V3 reduces slippage by 83% with 5.0x capital efficiency
recommendation.thesis_implication: Concentrated liquidity enables viable secondary markets with minimal LP capital requirement

selection_rationale.detail: V3 concentrated liquidity achieves 5.0x capital efficiency vs V2
selection_rationale.thesis_fit: Tokenized debt tokens trade in narrow price ranges (±5%), ideal for V3 concentration

risk_considerations.rationale: Debt tokens are stable assets trading near par; ±5% range captures >99% of expected price movements
risk_considerations.mitigation: Range can be widened if volatility increases; position rebalancing via Centrifuge protocol

implementation_guidance.fee_tier: 0.30% (30 bps) - appropriate for illiquid RWA pairs
implementation_guidance.lp_capital_required: ~20% of V2 equivalent for same effective depth
implementation_guidance.rebalancing: Managed via Centrifuge protocol-level LP coordination

thesis_conclusion.finding: V3 concentrated liquidity is the recommended AMM model for tokenized project finance debt
thesis_conclusion.benefit_quantification: V3 reduces liquidity premium by 70 bps vs traditional (13 bps better than V2)
thesis_conclusion.capital_efficiency_impact: Same market depth achievable with 20% of V2 LP capital
thesis_conclusion.market_viability: Concentrated liquidity enables viable secondary markets even with limited LP capital

platform_analysis.selection_rationale: Lowest fee (15 bps), CFG incentives, $1.45B TVL

lp_opportunity_cost.note: If sponsors provide AMM LP capital instead of Centrifuge

interest_rate_cap.notes: WP-11 InterestRateCap priced with flat vol; annual resets; premiums in USD.

interest_rate_collar.notes: Collar = long cap, short floor; premiums in USD.

thesis_summary.key_finding: DSCR-contingent amortization reduces breach probability from 24.6% to 2.4% (90% reduction), transforming the project from non-bankable to bankable status.

filtering.filter_reason: No filtering applied - construction-phase negative CFADS accepted

hedging_comparison.rationale: Collar provides similar breach reduction at 45% lower cost

methodology.description: Synthesized WACD combining coupon rates, tokenization benefits, AMM liquidity, and hedging costs
methodology.liquidity_source: V3 AMM (capped at Tinlake + 20 bps for conservatism)
methodology.regulatory_tail_risk: 7.5 bps premium for potential security-token bans

tokenized_optimal_hedged.description: Optimal structure with tokenization + rate cap hedge

thesis_finding.same_structure_benefit: Tokenizing the same 60/25/15 structure saves 86 bps
thesis_finding.optimal_structure_impact: Rebalancing to 55/34/11 has no cost impact - all tranches share same 4.5% coupon rate
thesis_finding.structure_rationale: 55/34/11 optimizes RISK-RETURN on Pareto frontier (more mezz = better risk-adjusted return), not cost
thesis_finding.net_tokenization_benefit: Net benefit vs traditional: 86 bps savings
thesis_finding.hedging_value: Rate cap adds 24 bps cost but reduces breach probability by ~23%
thesis_finding.regulatory_risk: Includes 7.5 bps regulatory tail-risk premium applied to tokenized scenarios
